name: SO Unanswered Bot
description: A SlackBot to help you find unanswered StackOverflow questions for your team

SLACK_TOKEN.description: An auth token from the Slack Slash command integration - https://rethinkdb-team.slack.com/services/new/slash-commands

STACKEXCHANGE_APP_TOKEN.description: In order to make queries with higher limit caps you need a StackExchange API key - https://stackapps.com/apps/oauth/register
